revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Scratch Cat Girl.png|30px]]Scratch Cat Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town Outskirts]] || Informs the player about the {{Pokemon|Lycanroc (Dusk)}} Requirement |- | [[File:Professor Kukui.png|30px]]Professor Kukui || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Professor Kukui's Lab]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | [[File:Teacher (gen 7).png|30px]]Teacher Emily || [[Trainers' School]] || Explains how dungeon floors work |- | [[File:Hala.png|30px]]Kahuna Hala || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town]] || Explains The Trials And Grand Trials |- | [[File:Looker.png|30px]]Looker || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Roadside Motel]] || Talks about Ultra Beasts and explain how to catch them |- | [[File:Owner.png|30px]]Café Owner || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Heahea City]] || Informs the player about The Trials of Akala island and The Kahuna. |- | [[File:Actor.png|30px]]Actor Meredith || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Paniola Town]] || Informs the player about Oricorio and the berry colors that attracted it in the farm. |- | [[File:Preschooler (female).png|30px]]Spectator || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Royal Avenue]] || Informs the player about the {{Pokemon|Alolan Raichu}} and {{Pokemon|Alolan Exeggutor}} Evolution Requirements. |- | [[File:Olivia.png|30px]]Kahuna Olivia || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Konikoni City]] || Informs the player about The Alola Pokémon League |- | [[File:Aether Branch Chief Wicke.png|30px]]Aether Branch Chief Wicke || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Aether Paradise]] || Informs the player the Boosted Roamer Rate Route |- | [[File:Nanu.png|30px]]Kahuna Nanu || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Malie City]] || Informs the player of the requirements to fight him |- | [[File:Worker.png|30px]]Worker Ovid || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Tapu Village]] || Informs the player about how to evolve {{Pokemon|Crabrawler}} into {{Pokemon|Crabominable}} |- | [[File:Team Plasma (colress).png|30px]] Colress || [[Mount Lanakila]] || Talks about the Light [[Evolution Items]] drop from {{Pokemon|Solgaleo}}, {{Pokemon|Lunala}} and {{Pokemon|Necrozma}}. |- | [[File:Mina.png|30px]]Captain Mina || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Seafolk Village]] || Informs the player of the Requirements of [[Mina's Houseboat]] Dungeon and where the next Kahuna is |- |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
